thread.title: Hillary Clinton Joined At Dinner By SNL's Kate McKinnon
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton Joined At Dinner By SNL's Kate McKinnon

author: John Freund
title: Hillary Clinton Joined At Dinner By SNL's Kate McKinnon

organizations.name: usps oscar de la renta forever stamp

text:
Hillary Clinton was spotted dining out with her doppleganger on SNL, Kate McKinnon. 
The Daily Mail reports that Clinton was spotted at Orso restaurant in New York, dining with McKinnon and a third party, likely SNL head writer Sarah Schneider.  

According to The Hill, a source revealed that “lots of laughter emanated from their table.” But dinner wasn’t all fun, as one rowdy restaurant-goer started a chant of ‘lock her up!’ 
The dinner has prompted some questions as to whether Clinton will be appearing on SNL in the near future, given that McKinnon is the cast member who portrays her on the show.  

After dinner, Clinton saw Glenn Close in ‘Sunset Boulevard’ on Broadway, where she snapped photographs with the cast back stage.  Clinton also drew applause from the crowd as she was spotted inside the theater.  

Clinton has been spotted at numerous events since her failed presidential bid in November.  She recently attended New York Fashion Week where she met with longtime friend Anna Winter for a USPS Oscar de la Renta Forever Stamp unveiling.  

Clinton used the opportunity to comment on the Dominian-born designers legacy, as well as the current administration’s stance on immigration.  
“Let there be many, many more immigrants with the love of America that Oscar de la Renta exemplified every single day,” Clinton said.
